message: Sure! Already on my way! The work will be finished soon.

replies.text: That sounds great! Remember to ask the stupid guard captain for a decent payment.

message: You're welcome. But you're not the only one who is happy. There are more people resting for a night in Fallhaven, which helps our economy. Some even bought items at my store! By the way, I was surprised, but I even got paid well by the guard captain.

replies.text: Great. Now everything is much better than it was before!
I wanted to ask about something else.
